{job="k8s-audit", node=~"$node"}
| json verb="verb", stage="stage",
       user="user.username",
       ns="objectRef.namespace",
       res="objectRef.resource",
       sub="objectRef.subresource",
       code="responseStatus.code",
       uri="requestURI",
       ua="userAgent"
| stage="ResponseComplete"
| (
    sub=~"exec|portforward|attach"
    or (res="secrets" and verb=~"get|list")
    or (res=~"serviceaccounts|roles|rolebindings|clusterroles|clusterrolebindings" and verb=~"create|update|patch|delete|deletecollection")
    or (res=~"daemonsets|deployments|statefulsets" and verb=~"create|update|patch|delete|deletecollection")
    or (res=~"mutatingwebhookconfigurations|validatingwebhookconfigurations|apiservices|customresourcedefinitions" and verb=~"create|update|patch|delete|deletecollection")
    or (res="nodes" and verb=~"patch|update")
  )
| res !~ "leases|events"
| ns !~ "kube-node-lease"
| user !~ "system:node:.*|system:kube-proxy|system:serviceaccount:longhorn-system:.*"
| line_format "code={{.code}} verb={{.verb}} user={{.user}} ns={{.ns}} res={{.res}} sub={{.sub}} uri={{.uri}} ua={{.ua}}"

{job="k8s-audit", node=~"$node"}
| json verb="verb", stage="stage",
       user="user.username",
       ns="objectRef.namespace",
       res="objectRef.resource",
       sub="objectRef.subresource",
       code="responseStatus.code",
       uri="requestURI",
       ua="userAgent"
| stage="ResponseComplete"
| (
    (res="secrets" and verb="watch")
    or (res="serviceaccounts" and sub="token" and verb="create" and user=~"system:kube-controller-manager|system:kube-scheduler|system:apiserver")
  )
| res !~ "leases|events"
| ns !~ "kube-node-lease"
| line_format "code={{.code}} verb={{.verb}} user={{.user}} ns={{.ns}} res={{.res}} sub={{.sub}} uri={{.uri}} ua={{.ua}}"

{job="k8s-audit", node=~"$node"}
| json verb="verb", stage="stage",
       user="user.username",
       ns="objectRef.namespace",
       res="objectRef.resource",
       code="responseStatus.code",
       uri="requestURI",
       ua="userAgent"
| stage="ResponseComplete"
| code != ""
| code >= 300
| user !~ "system:serviceaccount:longhorn-system:.*"
| (res!="ciliumendpoints" or code!=404)
| line_format "code={{.code}} verb={{.verb}} user={{.user}} ns={{.ns}} res={{.res}} uri={{.uri}} ua={{.ua}}"
